name: Resume (Demo)
description:
After being a NEET (Not in Education, Employment, or Training) for 4 months, you've finally been given 3 surefire opportunities to choose from: be a personal assistant of a famous model, a medical assistant for a psychiatric clinic, or a secret agent working for the government!

Which job will you take? How do you want to shape your destiny? Will you be able to get HER heart?
